A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Such a let down. Luke Skywalker was underdeveloped. The casino scenes were unnecessary and Del Toro's role added nothing. Yoda didn't look like Yoda. It was a mess. There were some good things\, but the back and forth between scenes and the jumping were sometimes jarring. I didn't feel any emotional tie with the characters at all. Luke's transcendence was ridiculous. I love all things Star Wars\, but this felt like an experimental film attempting to bridge a gap.
